footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Passive Talents: Collei

fields.name: Floral Sidewinder
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 1*
> If one of your party members has triggered Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions before the Floral Ring returns it will grant the character the Sprout effect upon return, which will continuously deal Dendry DMG equivalent to 40% of Collei's ATK to nearby opponents for 3 seconds. If another Sprout effect is triggered during its initial duration, the initial effect will be removed.

fields.name: The Languid Wood
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 4*
> When a character within the Cuilein-Anbar Zone triggers Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions, the Zone's duration will be increased by 1 seconds. A single Trump-Card Kitty can be extended by up to 3 seconds.

fields.name: Gliding Champion of Sumeru
fields.value:
*Unlocked automatically*
> Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effect.
